text: @realDonaldTrump Gosh! Have you EVER been wrong? You are so perfect! From calls to Ukraine to foreseeing the CoVID-19 pandemic you have never made a mistake! OTHERS have made mistakes aplenty (like that traitorous bastard Romney!) but never you. Why can't there be more of you? Multiple Trumps.
